name: OpaChat
body:
### What is OpaChat ?

OpaChat is a simple, one-room, scalable real-time web chat, with file sharing - built in [Opa](http://opalang.org).

### What does it look like ?

![OpaChat Screenshot](images/screenshot.png)

It looks like this :)
tagline: A simple scalable, real-time web chat application in Opa
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
